result.name: digital-record-store-for-images-drci
result.notes: Hosted by Iron Mountain. The DRC is an IBM Image on Demand System. It stores and manages digital images and fixed content. It currently holds British Coal Corporation (BCC) scanned Medical Records (formerly paper based),  EDM Legacy (Inbound, Medical and Outbound folders), Nurse Records and VWF Medical records from a former Atos contract. It also holds a number of other scanned images from legacy databases relating to BCC staff records, earning and spirometry records transferred for other databases. In addition NCS Claim Archive data is transferred on a regular basis.
